DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of the study is to identify and describe any suspected (AEs) in all patients with NVAF treated with Apixaban, as a request of the National Center of Pharmacovigilance (CNFV) in Mexico.
DOC.criteria: For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com All patients with NVAF at the sentinel site for the CNFV in Mexico who received at least 1 dose of Apixaban to reduce the risk of stroke or systemic embolism during the specified 24month study period Subjects who received Apixaban as part of a clinical trial Subjects who received Apixaban for any indication other than local approval (ie, to reduce the risk of stroke and systemic embolism in patients with NVAF)
